Shortening column names for meteorological variables

meteo_shortening.Rd

Shortening column names of meteorological parameters to improve the readability of downloaded dataset and removing duplicated column names

meteo_shortening(data, col_names = "short", remove_duplicates = TRUE)

Arguments

data

downloaded dataset with original column names
col_names

three types of column names possible: "short" - default, values with shorten names, "full" - full English description, "polish" - original names in the dataset
remove_duplicates

whether to remove duplicated column names (default TRUE - i.e., columns with duplicated names are deleted)

Examples

  monthly <- meteo_monthly(rank = "climate", year = 1969)
  colnames(monthly)
#>  [1] "rank"             "id"               "station"          "yy"              
#>  [5] "mm"               "tmax_abs"         "tmax_mean"        "tmin_abs"        
#>  [9] "tmin_mean"        "t2m_mean_mon"     "t5cm_min"         "rr_monthly"      
#> [13] "rr_max_daily"     "first_day_max_rr" "last_day_max_rr"  "snowcover_max"   
#> [17] "snowcover_days"   "rain_days"        "snow_days"        "rh_mean_mon"     
#> [21] "ws_mean_mon"      "cloud_mean_mon"  
  abbr <- meteo_shortening(data = monthly, col_names = "short", remove_duplicates = TRUE)
  head(abbr)
#>             rank        id         station   yy mm tmax_abs tmax_mean tmin_abs
#> 1716 KLIMATYCZNA 249220170 BALIGRÓD-MCHAWA 1969  1      9.0      -0.3    -24.2
#> 1720 KLIMATYCZNA 249220170 BALIGRÓD-MCHAWA 1969  2      9.0       1.6    -26.1
#> 1721 KLIMATYCZNA 249220170 BALIGRÓD-MCHAWA 1969  3     10.0       2.2    -17.0
#> 1722 KLIMATYCZNA 249220170 BALIGRÓD-MCHAWA 1969  4     24.5      10.9     -7.4
#> 1723 KLIMATYCZNA 249220170 BALIGRÓD-MCHAWA 1969  5     27.7      20.0     -1.0
#> 1724 KLIMATYCZNA 249220170 BALIGRÓD-MCHAWA 1969  6     25.5      18.8      3.8
#>      tmin_mean t2m_mean_mon t5cm_min rr_monthly rr_max_daily first_day_max_rr
#> 1716     -10.9         -5.5        0       10.8          6.8               24
#> 1720      -5.7         -2.3        0       25.9          6.9                3
#> 1721      -5.6         -1.6        0       25.2          9.2               27
#> 1722      -0.2          5.6        0       56.6         13.0               14
#> 1723       7.1         14.3        0       76.0         36.6               29
#> 1724       9.5         14.4        0      137.6         39.9                8
#>      last_day_max_rr snowcover_max snowcover_days rain_days snow_days
#> 1716              NA            17             24         1         5
#> 1720              NA            13             20         4         5
#> 1721              NA            11             17         2        12
#> 1722              NA            11              9         5         5
#> 1723              NA             0              0        11         0
#> 1724              NA             0              0        19         0
#>      rh_mean_mon ws_mean_mon cloud_mean_mon
#> 1716           0         1.5            4.2
#> 1720           0         1.0            5.6
#> 1721           0         1.1            5.4
#> 1722           0         1.1            3.6
#> 1723           0         1.3            3.6
#> 1724           0         1.2            5.7
